value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hel!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|So... At last, the living set foot in the
heart of death's domain.$k$pAlas, to join us means that you will
soon be alive no longer.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You have slain countless people, both
in our Askr and another...$k$pYou stole Eir's family from her.
You stole her memories...$k$pAnd as if that wasn't enough, you
stole her very life, again and again!$k$pEveryone has suffered bitter loss due
to your schemes. I should know—I've
lost a father to them.$k$pYour existence is a blight on this
very world, Hel!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|It is indeed, by definition. You speak
of death as if it is evil, but the truth is
that it simply is.$k$pFor as long as the living remain alive,
they wish to continue to be so. Yet
the end to life is an inevitable fact.$k$pWith every death, on every world,
I grow stronger—and the number of
worlds, as you know, is limitless...$k$pYour demise will soon nourish me,
just as your counterpart's did.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|I gave him my word, that other
Alfonse, and I intend to fulfill that
promise today...$k$p$EFace_Anger|This is the end. I declare—here and
now—you will claim no more lives!
Not ever again!$k$p

$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$SbpBGM_BATTLE_BOSS_02,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hel is vanishing! Quickly,
Princess Veronica!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Angrboða... Maiden of life and death...
Mother of the triad cataclysm...$k$pSlay the living! Slay the dead!$k$pBring death to that which cannot die!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,128,0,128,255|$Fi1000|Now, $Nu!
Loose the divine weapon upon Hel!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|No!$k$p$Sbs8000|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi3000|Is this...death?$k$pCan death itself...actually perish?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Mother!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Foolish child... I've already told you...
I have never been your mother...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|But you have been. I remember.$k$pWhen I was small, you held me in
your arms. You embraced me...$k$pThose soft arms were not my birth
mother's, Hel. They were yours...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That...was only pantomime...
an imitation of your real mother...$k$pIt was only to control you...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|All the same, I...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Why do you wear...that look upon
your face?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Because I am sad.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face_Pain|To see me perish...makes you sad?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Yes.$k$pI may not have been a daughter to
you, in your mind...$k$pBut you were my only family. To me...
You will always be my mother.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Goodbye, Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$pIt is finally over.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Yes. At last.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I promised to make Askr your new
home. To give you a happy life there.
It is time to make good on my word.$k$pLet's go home.$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|

$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|...$k$pAh!$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|A dream. A marvelous dream...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|Tell me.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|We'd just defeated Hel. All of Askr
rejoiced and began a life of peace...$k$pIt was a happiness unlike any I have
experienced in my waking life.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|Perhaps it was more than a dream...$k$pPerhaps it was a vision.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|A vision of what, exactly?$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|There are many worlds. Perhaps you
were given a glimpse of one.$k$pIf that's the case...then who's to say
which of the two worlds is more real?$k$pMaybe this life is the dream, and what
you witnessed was the true reality.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|So there could be a reality out there,
in which everyone is safe and happy...$k$pYes. I'd like to believe that.$k$pEven if it is not a world for you and
me... I find solace in the idea.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|Me too.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|What dreams occupy your mind now,
Alfonse? Are they pleasant visions?$k$pI hope they are...$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
